overview: Best Butt, Best Female Performer, Starlet of the Year - the list goes on for this award-winning superstar fan favorite! Abella Danger definitely needs her own release to show off her stellar performances at ZT including incredible anal, naughty cheerleading, strap-on lesbian and much more! It's a 2-disc set chock full of Danger at her finest!
title: Everybody Loves Abella Danger
